sense.def:
To rely on someone or something
pomeni, da potrebujemo določeno osebo ali stvar za normalno življenje ali delovanje.

seg.quote: Some industries rely heavily on government for finance.

sense.def:
To rely on someone to work well or behave as we want them to
pomeni zaupati nekomu, da bo svoje delo dobro opravil ali da se bo vedel tako, kot želimo od njega.

seg.quote: One could always rely on him to be polite.
